institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) operating rules/Article 13 (Work performed by representative organizations, etc.)
contents: Article 13 (Work performed by representative organizations, etc.) ① Representative organizations play a leading role in ISC operation and project performance. ② Participating organizations participate in ISC decision-making, share a pool of professional manpower for smooth project performance, and member companies. ③ Participating companies participate in ISC projects such as participation in ISC decision-making, industrial technological changes, analysis of industrial human resources status, and projects related to NCS/NCS-based qualifications and work-study parallel systems. Participate actively.
